attributes.description:
Welcome to the world of the New Renault Kwid which features a host of new styling, design and safety features. The New Kwid becomes more modern and assertive; the new front fascia exudes a sense of aggression which is nowhere to be found amongst its competition. The Kwid’s sleek style is underlined by new Signature Ornate Lighting. The SUV-styled headlamps and silver streak LED DRLs create a striking impression. At the rear, tail lamps with LED light guides leave a distinct trail.
The exterior design is further enhanced with the new boomerang shaped sculpted roof with arching roof rails. The stylish new grille and its imposing front adds prominence to the Kwid’s renowned SUV-look, while the new 14” multi-spoke wheels with a high 180mm ground clearance further accentuate the SUV stance. The New Kwid also comes with SUV-styled skid plates that prevent damage to the under body on rough terrain, ensuring a hassle-free drive and complete peace-of-mind

Estimated monthly payment is R 2 550.00 over 72 months with 10% deposit of R 14 490.00 at a rate of 12% (PRIME + 3%).

* Please note that these calculations are only estimates and must be confirmed with your finance provider.

attributes.description:
ll the flair of the KONA has been recaptured in the N-inspired KONA N Line. Like you, it moves with a different energy, featuring advanced technology and inspired aerodynamics. The N-inspired interior comes complete in leather, featuring a red and black trim as well as the iconic N-Badge on the seats and gear-knob. It’s an everyday sports car that will be right at home in your driveway.

Bring your unique touch of magic to the world every time tyre meets road in the new KONA. What you see is only a hint of what you get & what you get is plenty with a range of ingenious innovations in an SUV that isn’t afraid to be itself, stylish & driven.
Play your life’s theme songs at the touch of a button with Android Auto & Apple CarPlay. Sit comfortably behind the wheel of the KONA on artificial leather seat trims & take every trip to the next level with rear parking sensors & camera, daytime running lights & HAC (Hill Start Assist Control).
Nobody does you better than you and no SUV embraces individuality, style & colour quite like the new KONA. 

Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged, Contact us today! Price excludes on the road fees.

With high-tech features like Apple CarPlay that allows you to navigate your next adventure, stream your favourite music apps, make and receive phone calls – the Venue promises a whole new driving experience.
The Hyundai Venue is packed with features to ensure your safety. Enjoy a six-airbag system, Rear Parking Assist, with ABS and EBD that promises stability at all times.

The i30 N is Hyundai's first true high-performance car developed to debut the N division and redefine the way the world feels
about Hyundai. With the award-winning third generation i30 as its basis, the i30 N was built by our best engineers to deliver
uncompromised driving exhilaration, both on the road and the track, without foregoing the comfort and practicality needed
for daily enjoyment.

attributes.description:
More breathtakingly distinct design. More cutting-edge technologies. More advanced features to
enhance your comfort and safety. Improvements to handling and a stronger body means an even
more refined ride. More reasons to get out and seize each day. It’s about discovering a whole new
way of seeing the world. Exploring. Venturing out. With so much innovation, style and comfort to
enjoy, the  Sportage is the perfect car for making every journey memorable.
Eye-catching headlamps feature distinctive
LED Daytime Running Lights to ensure optimal
visibility on the road, day and night.
The sculpted front bonnet features a revised
version of Kia’s signature ‘Tiger-Nose’ grille for
added sporty appeal.
Designed to deliver when it comes to both performance and practicality, the Sportage’s engines are just as impressive as you’d
imagine. But its power isn’t limited to its engines only.
Structurally reinforced with ultra-high tensile steel to offer even more protection, the Sportage’s advanced body shell
is built to ensure safety. Combined with a host of active and passive safety systems, including six airbags, the Sportage is one
of the safest in its class.
There’s more, the Kia Sportage is also designed to be comfortable. In fact, with spacious dimensions and reclining seats, every
seat feels like the best in the house.
With so much variety and such peace of mind, there’s a Sportage that is perfect for your needs.

attributes.description:
The new SANTA FE is a premium SUV that is top of its class and made to carry any modern family from Point A to B, with poise and presence. Boasting advanced safety features, an infotainment system with CarPlay for quality entertainment and a panoramic sunroof, the new SANTA FE delivers a unique driving experience on every family trip.
The SANTA FE puts safety first through the innovations of Blind Spot Detection, ABS, ESP and HAC. Similarly, Driver, Passenger side and Curtain Airbags, ensure that the wellbeing of your family is always a priority. This SUV leaves nothing to chance.
From the panoramic sunroof that offers captivating views to the soothing heated and ventilated front seats, the Santa Fe has been engineered to help you and your family enjoy every drive. This premium SUV matches functionality to aesthetics with wireless charging, an electronic submission button and a beautiful island-style console. Every detail is designed to cater to you.
Enjoy the feeling of getting behind the wheel of Hyundai’s premium, high-performance SUV.
Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged, Contact us today! Price excludes on the road fees.

attributes.description:
The bold all-new Grand CRETA comes in an array of finishes, including Moonlight Blue, Phantom Black, Polar White, Titan Gray & Typhoon Silver, complemented by a dual-tone black & gray leather interior. The next-gen 7-seater features a futuristic interior design with a progressive touchscreen UI.
Make your way, let the light in through the sunroof, set the mood with the Infotainment System’s CarPlay and relax with Automatic Climate Control. The all-new Grand CRETA features Wireless Phone Charging, Multifunction Steering Wheel, Electric Side Mirror Adjustment & Folding Function and more.
Your safety comes first. Keep control over long trips with Cruise Control & ESP (Electronic Stability Program). Keep a clear view of the road before you with LED Fog & Daytime Running Lights and stay safe in the face of the unexpected with Driver, Passenger, Side & Curtain Airbags, ABS & EBD
Take a closer look at the all-new Grand CRETA and get a front-row seat to engineering that delivers more with each drive.
Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged, Contact us today! Price excludes on the road fees.

attributes.description:
Explore the less-travelled roads in space-age comfort and style.
Cruise powerfully along mountain passes, tropical coasts and winding rivers.
Discover what's around the next corner, and the next, and the next.
Find exciting new stories in unexpected places.
Do it all with smooth, assured AWD power and unrivalled safety technology.
Go the way you want, in the all-new Kia Sorento. 
Step away from the everyday and admire the design of the Kia
Sorento. With its distinctive new contours and wheel arch cladding,
body colour door handles with a touch of satin chrome, sleek trim,
and side sills, and distinctive daylight opening graphic, this car
perfectly combines on-road sophistication with off-road thrills while
at the same time producing lower emissions.

Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged, Contact us today! Price excludes on the road fees.
